channel.title: World
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from World, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Experts urge release of boat strike video as US admiral denies ‘kill them all’ order
item.description: Democrat Jim Himes calls footage ‘one of the most troubling scenes’ he’s observed in public service Analysis: Killing of survivors sparks outrage – bu...

item.title: Top Democrat says he is ‘deeply disturbed’ by footage of boat strikes seen at classified briefing – live
item.description: Jack Reed, the top Democrat on the Senate armed services committee, comments on briefing by navy admiral Frank Bradley Experts urge release of boat st...

item.title: Australia news live: severe heatwave warning for NSW; Australia receives Trump review of Aukus deal
item.description: Temperatures expected to exceed 40C in parts of New South Wales’ east. Follow today’s news live Get our breaking news email , free app or daily news p...

item.title: Russia blocks Snapchat and restricts Apple’s FaceTime, state officials say
item.description: Latest effort to control communications comes as regulator claims apps being used to ‘conduct terrorist activities’ Russian authorities blocked access...

item.title: Farage turns on broadcasters over racism allegations as number of claims hits 28
item.description: Reform leader suggests he would boycott BBC, saying he has had letter from Dulwich pupils defending him Nigel Farage has turned on broadcasters for qu...

item.title: Two hundred homes evacuated in Derby as two men arrested on suspicion of explosives offences
item.description: A controlled explosion took place after two men were arrested on suspicion of explosives offences.

item.title: He’s King of romance, but what’s Bollywood star Shah Rukh Khan’s marriage advice?
item.description: Shah Rukh Khan and fellow actor Kajol were in London for the unveiling of a new statue of them.

item.title: England World Cup subs might stay indoors - Tuchel
item.description: England manager Thomas Tuchel says he may have his substitutes stay in the dressing room during matches at the World Cup next summer because of the ri...

item.title: 'All Israeli people are with us', say parents of last dead hostage in Gaza
item.description: The body of Ran Gvili, a 24-year-old Israeli police officer, is the last not yet returned by Hamas from Gaza.

item.title: Hegseth did not give order to 'kill them all' in Venezuela boat strike, lawmakers say
item.description: Admiral Frank Bradley, who gave the order for a second strike on a drug boat, was on Capitol Hill briefing lawmakers about the September incident.
